channel.title: Publication on 4I Lab
channel.description: Recent content in Publication on 4I Lab

item.description: Artificial Intelligence [1] Yajie Bao, Yang Li, Shao-Lun Huang, Lin Zhang, Amir R Zamir, and Leonidas J Guibas. An information-theoretic metric of transferability for task transfer learning. In 26th IEEE International Conference on Image Processing (ICIP). 2019. [2] Xinlei Chen, Xiangxiang Xu, Xinyu Liu, Hae Young Noh, Lin Zhang, and Pei Zhang. Hap: fine-grained dynamic air pollution map reconstruction by hybrid adaptive particle filter. In Proceedings of the 14th ACM Conference on Embedded Network Sensor Systems CD-ROM, 336–337.

Internet of Things [1] Weixi Gu, Yue Zhang, Fei Ma, Khalid Mosalam, Lin Zhang, and Shiguang Ni. Real-time emotion detection via e-see. In Proceedings of the 16th ACM Conference on Embedded Networked Sensor Systems, 420–421. ACM, 2018. [2] Jing Lian, Yang Li, Weixi Gu, Shao-Lun Huang, and Lin Zhang. Joint mobility pattern mining with urban region partitions. In Proceedings of the 15th EAI International Conference on Mobile and Ubiquitous Systems: Computing, Networking and Services, 362–371.
